description.value: Your breath causes lasting hindrance to those it harms. Creatures who fail their saves against your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Breath of the Dragon (Dragonblood)]{Breath of the Dragon} gain one of the following conditions, based on the damage type of your breath: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} (electricity, cold, fire, or sonic damage), @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 1} (acid, physical, or poison damage), or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1} (force, mental, spirit, vitality, or void damage). The condition lasts until the end of your next turn.
